body:
Comment 4: 
Russ,

I think the problem is that cgo generates these comments "//line :1" in _cgo_gotypes.go.
For example, this is extract from a _cgo_gotypes.go file:

type _Ctype_struct_SDL_KeyboardEvent struct {
//line :1
	typ	_Ctype_Uint8
//line :1
	which	_Ctype_Uint8
//line :1
	state	_Ctype_Uint8
//line :1
	_	[1]byte
//line :1
	keysym	_Ctype_SDL_keysym
//line :1
}

I do not understand why only windows was broken. Do you? Should we fix this?

Alex
